messages.message: On Aihub Sandbox How does one know the reason these failed to classify? Also should consider making the progress bar red on failure
there’s no current way to see _why_ these failures happened, unfortunately

I think this is generally true for all errors in ai hub though — we don’t have a good way of converting an error from our backend into a nice, user-friendly error message. So usually if you do see an error message it’s just be something like “Failed to do x” or “Error getting x”. In these cases we also don’t provide a reason

It'd be nice if we could tell the user what they can try to resolve this. I'm not sure what the possible workarounds might be, but I can help with copy if we want to add some text.

@joshbronko I just ran into this on UAT internal and worked around it by disabling splitting in project settings, FYI. https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05EQQJGN7L/p1701819131487909
